name: Antichthon
description:
Antichthon is an exploration game for the HighPixel game jam.

Playtime: ~15 minutes

CONTROLS:

  • WADS - movement
  • E - interact
  • Esc - Menu

Objective:

In preparation for your launch you need to

  • Say goodbye to all your friends (7)
  • Eat your fill of apples (5)
  • Finish writing your letter (3 terminals)

You can check your Menu for the status on each of these tasks at any time.  Once you have finished all of these tasks, you may launch from inside the rocket.

All music used with permission:

https://megamaster.bandcamp.com/album/hills-and-mountains
